com.indragie.cmput301as1

Class DateEditText

  • java.lang.Object
    • EditText
      • com.indragie.cmput301as1.DateEditText

  • public class DateEditText
extends EditText
    Subclass of EditText that shows a date picker dialog when tapped, and updates the date text when a new date is picked.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DateEditText.OnDateChangedListener
      Listener to be called when the user picks a different date.
